title: Democracy: Threats, Defenders and Enemies
sub_head: The lack of an initial response from Western leaders as Russia massed troops gave Putin the confidence to invade Ukraine.
body:
Elaine Kamarck and William Galston (“Will Democrats Throw It All Away in 2024?” op-ed, Feb. 26) view Donald Trump as the primary threat to our democracy. They avoid mentioning the real challenge to our institutions: the Democrats’ hubristic plans to pack the Supreme Court, add new blue states to pack the Senate and end the Electoral College.
Ms. Kamarck and Mr. Galston also fail to address the radical assumptions underlying the Democrats’ agenda: the identity politics that divides Americans and promotes enmity, a socialist materialism that denies our country’s founding ideals, especially individual freedom, and an extreme concept of justice overriding common sense and driving a remaking of the family, schools and society. Thoughtful independent and Democratic voters will stand up for the great American tradition and oppose this agenda.
